</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns shown text in the item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[tvText]] [idc, path] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name> s2</name>=<value> control [[tvText]] path </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name> p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]] of [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
